list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: Investigations tab now displays investigation list and controls.

<<Window.Resources> <Style x:Key="MiscLabels" TargetType="TextBlock"> <!--Setter Property="FontSize" Value="10" /--> <Setter Property="VerticalAlignment" Value="Center" /> </Style> <Style x:Key="MiscDropdown" TargetType="ComboBox"> <!-- Setter Property="FontSize" Value="10" /--> <Setter Property="VerticalAlignment" Value="Stretch" /> <Setter Property="HorizontalAlignment" Value="Stretch" /> <Setter Property="HorizontalContentAlignment" Value="Right" /> <Setter Property="VerticalContentAlignment" Value="Center" /> </Style> <Style x:Key="ListBoxStyle" TargetType="{x:Type ListBox}"> <Setter Property="Background" Value="Transparent"/> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="Transparent"/> <Setter Property="BorderBrush" Value="Transparent"/> <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="0"/> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="0"/> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0"/> </Style> </Window.Resources> <DockPanel> <Menu Width="Auto" Height="20" DockPanel.Dock="Top"> <MenuItem Header="File"> <MenuItem Header="Open" Click="OpenFunction" /> <MenuItem Header="Save" Click="SaveFunction" /> <MenuItem Header="Backup" Click="BackupFunction" /> </MenuItem> <MenuItem Header="Edit" ItemsSource = "{Binding EditOptions}" Click = "EditMenuItem_Click"/> <MenuItem Header="Tools" ItemsSource = "{Binding ToolsOptions}" Click = "ToolsMenuItem_Click"/> </Menu> <Grid> <TabControl Name = "TabControl" SelectionChanged = "TabControl_SelectionChanged"> <TabItem Header="General"> <ListBox x:Name="ListBox" > <Label x:Name="ChecksumLabel" Content="Checksum:"/> <Label x:Name="SteamIdLabel" Content="Steam ID:" MouseDoubleClick="EditSteamLabel"/> <Label x:Name="SizeLabel" Content="Size:"/> <Label x:Name="FilePathLabel" Content="FilePath:"/> </ListBox> </TabItem> <!-- Investigations ================================================================================--> <TabItem Header="Investigations"> <Grid> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <!-- Investigation List Display --> <ColumnDefinition Width="2*" /> <!-- Investigation Details --> <ColumnDefinition Width="5*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <!-- Investigation List --> <DockPanel Grid.Column="0"> <ListBox DockPanel.Dock="Left" x:Name="InvestigationVisibleList" ItemsSource="{Binding InvestigationCollection}" SelectionChanged="InvestigationList_SelectionChanged" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" > <ListBox.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <TextBlock Text="{Binding InvestigationTitle, Mode=OneWay}" /> </DataTemplate> </ListBox.ItemTemplate> </ListBox> </DockPanel> <!-- Investigation Details --> <Grid Grid.Column="1" x:Name="CurrentInvestigationVisible"> <Grid> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <!-- State Controls --> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <!-- Goal&Rank --> <RowDefinition Height="2*" /> <!-- Monsters --> <RowDefinition Height="4*" /> <!-- Stats --> <RowDefinition Height="2*" /> <!-- Values --> <RowDefinition Height="7*" /> <!-- Rewards --> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <!-- Rewards Display --> <RowDefinition Height="2*" /> <!-- Utility Controls --> <RowDefinition Height="2*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <!-- State Controls --> <Grid Grid.Row="0"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="3*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Button Grid.Column="0" Click="InvestigationList_First"><<</Button> <Button Grid.Column="1" Click="InvestigationList_Prev"><</Button> <Button Grid.Column="2" Click="InvestigationList_ToggleCurrent" Content="{Binding ToggleState}"/> <Button Grid.Column="3" Click="InvestigationList_Next">></Button> <Button Grid.Column="4" Click="InvestigationList_Last">>></Button> </Grid> <!-- Goal --> <Grid Grid.Row = "1"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <ComboBox Grid.Row="0" ItemsSource = "{Binding GoalChoices, Mode = OneWay}" SelectedItem= "{Binding Goal, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay, IsAsync=True}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" /> <ComboBox Grid.Row="1" ItemsSource = "{Binding RankChoices, Mode = OneWay}" SelectedItem= "{Binding InvestigationRank, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay, IsAsync=True}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" /> </Grid> <!-- Monsters --> <Grid Grid.Row="2"> </TextBlock> <ComboBox Grid.Row="4" Grid.Column="1" Style="{StaticResource MiscDropdown}" ItemsSource = "{Binding CurrentFlourish, IsAsync=True}" SelectedItem= "{Binding Flourish, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay, IsAsync=True}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" /> <TextBlock Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="5" Style="{StaticResource MiscLabels}">Y0: </TextBlock> <ComboBox Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="5" Style="{StaticResource MiscDropdown}" ItemsSource = "{Binding CommonValues}" SelectedItem= "{Binding Y0, Mode = TwoWay}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" /> <TextBlock Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="6" Style="{StaticResource MiscLabels}">Y3: </TextBlock> <ComboBox Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="6" Style="{StaticResource MiscDropdown}" ItemsSource = "{Binding <xctk:IntegerUpDown Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="8" Minimum="1" Maximum="255" Value = "{Binding Attempts}"/> </Grid> <!-- Rewards --> <Grid Grid.Row="5"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="5*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <TextBlock Grid.Column="0">Rewards?: </TextBlock> <ComboBox Grid.Column="1" ItemsSource = "{Binding BoxValues}" SelectedItem= "{Binding BoxBonus, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" /> </Grid> <!-- Rewards Display --> <Grid Grid.Row="6">
</Grid> <!-- Utility Controls --> <Grid Grid.Row="7">
</Grid> </Grid> </Grid> </Grid> </TabItem> <!-- Inventory ================================================================================--> </TabControl> </Grid>
</DockPanel>.../>
